text:
@TrumpWarRoom @EricTrump Mitch McConnell just said that the emergency paid sick leave legislation Democrats put forward to help Americans affected by the coronavirus crisis is an "ideological wish list."

And now, Senate Republicans are refusing to pass this important bill that will give aid to Americans

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
